meanings.definition: A phylum of marine deuterostome animals, including acorn worms and pterobranchs.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study hemichordates to learn more about marine creatures.
meanings.sent2: Hemichordates play a crucial role in the ecosystem of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The hemichordates had a party under the sea, celebrating their uniqueness.
meanings.sent4: In the depths of the ocean, hemichordates dance gracefully like underwater acrobats.
meanings.sent5: The hemichordates, with their fascinating shapes, captivate marine biologists.

meanings.definition: Any member of the phylum Hemichordata.
meanings.sent1: An interesting fact is that hemichordates have unique characteristics.
meanings.sent2: Hemichordates can be found in various marine environments around the world.
meanings.sent3: At the marine museum, the hemichordates were the stars of the show.
meanings.sent4: The hemichordates, like hidden treasures of the sea, reveal their secrets slowly.
meanings.sent5: Children love to learn about hemichordates due to their intriguing nature.
